review: So far so good with this super device, giving one access to Netflix, Amazon, Hulu and several other providers of TV shows and films - all in one place. Membership in the various providers is necessary, as is WIFI service. The device can travel (it requires an HDMI port on a TV, and either a USB port or electrical outlet), and remains keyed to your accounts. It's a bit of a gear head luxury but a fantastic addition. And it's only $40. Not bad.
